slides.title: Welcome to IFRS Reporting
slides.content:
# International Financial Reporting

Master the **global language** of accounting.

## What You Will Learn

- **Framework** - Conceptual basis
- **Standards** - Key IFRS
- **Groups** - Consolidation
- **Analysis** - Interpretation

## Structure

| Area | Standards |
|------|----------|
| Presentation | IAS 1, 7, 8 |
| Assets | IAS 16, 38, 36 |
| Revenue | IFRS 15 |
| Groups | IFRS 3, 10 |

slides.title: Conceptual Framework
slides.content:
# 2018 Framework

## Objective

```
Provide useful information for:
- Existing and potential investors
- Lenders and other creditors
```

## Qualitative Characteristics

| Primary | Enhancing |
|---------|----------|
| Relevance | Comparability |
| Faithful representation | Verifiability |
| | Timeliness |
| | Understandability |

## Elements

- Assets, Liabilities, Equity
- Income, Expenses

slides.title: IFRS 15 - Revenue
slides.content:
# Revenue from Contracts

## Five-Step Model

```
1. Identify contract
2. Identify performance obligations
3. Determine transaction price
4. Allocate to obligations
5. Recognize when satisfied
```

## Satisfaction

| Type | When |
|------|------|
| Point in time | Control transfers |
| Over time | Continuous |

## Variable Consideration

- Expected value
- Most likely amount
- Subject to constraint

slides.title: IFRS 16 - Leases
slides.content:
# Lease Accounting

## Lessee Model

```
Recognize:
- Right-of-use asset
- Lease liability

At PV of lease payments
```

## Subsequent Measurement

| Asset | Liability |
|-------|----------|
| Depreciate | Amortize |
| Impairment | Interest |

## Exemptions

- Short-term (< 12 months)
- Low value assets

slides.title: IFRS 9 - Financial Instruments
slides.content:
# Classification and Measurement

## Categories

| Category | Basis |
|----------|-------|
| Amortized cost | Business model + SPPI |
| FVOCI | Collect and sell |
| FVPL | Other |

## Impairment - ECL

| Stage | ECL |
|-------|-----|
| 1 | 12-month |
| 2 | Lifetime |
| 3 | Lifetime (credit-impaired) |

## Hedging

- Fair value
- Cash flow
- Net investment

slides.title: IFRS 3 - Business Combinations
slides.content:
# Acquisition Accounting

## Acquisition Method

```
1. Identify acquirer
2. Determine acquisition date
3. Recognize assets/liabilities at FV
4. Calculate goodwill
```

## Goodwill

```
Consideration
+ NCI
+ Previously held equity
- FV of net assets
= Goodwill
```

## Contingent Consideration

- Fair value at acquisition
- Remeasure subsequently

slides.title: IAS 36 - Impairment
slides.content:
# Asset Impairment

## When to Test

| Asset | Frequency |
|-------|----------|
| Goodwill | Annually |
| Intangibles (indefinite) | Annually |
| Others | When indicators |

## Calculation

```
Recoverable Amount = Higher of:
- Fair value less costs to sell
- Value in use

Impairment = Carrying - Recoverable
```

## Cash Generating Units

- Allocate for testing
- Impair goodwill first

slides.title: IFRS 10 - Consolidation
slides.content:
# Control Model

## Definition of Control

```
Control exists when investor has:
1. Power over investee
2. Exposure to variable returns
3. Ability to use power for returns
```

## Power Indicators

| Indicator | Evidence |
|-----------|----------|
| Voting rights | > 50% |
| Potential rights | Substantive |
| Contractual | Agreements |
| De facto | Dispersed others |

## Consolidation Process

- Combine line by line
- Eliminate intercompany

slides.title: IAS 28 - Associates
slides.content:
# Equity Method

## Significant Influence

| Indicator | Evidence |
|-----------|----------|
| Voting | 20-50% |
| Board | Representation |
| Transactions | Material |
| Interchange | Management |

## Equity Method

```
Initial: Cost
Subsequent: +/- Share of P&L
           - Dividends
           - Impairment
```

## Joint Ventures

- Also use equity method
- Joint control required

slides.title: IAS 21 - Foreign Currency
slides.content:
# Currency Translation

## Functional Currency

```
Currency of primary economic environment
```

## Foreign Operations

| Item | Rate |
|------|------|
| Assets/liabilities | Closing |
| Income/expense | Average |
| Equity | Historical |

## Exchange Differences

- P&L: Monetary items
- OCI: Foreign operations translation

slides.title: IAS 12 - Income Taxes
slides.content:
# Deferred Tax

## Temporary Differences

| Type | Effect |
|------|--------|
| Taxable | DTL |
| Deductible | DTA |

## Recognition

```
DTL: Always recognize
DTA: Only if probable recovery
```

## Measurement

- Enacted tax rates
- Expected reversal period
- No discounting

slides.title: IAS 19 - Employee Benefits
slides.content:
# Post-Employment Benefits

## Plan Types

| Type | Risk Bearer |
|------|-------------|
| Defined contribution | Employee |
| Defined benefit | Employer |

## DB Measurement

```
Present value of obligation
- Fair value of plan assets
= Net liability (or asset)
```

## Components

| Component | Recognition |
|-----------|-------------|
| Service cost | P&L |
| Net interest | P&L |
| Remeasurements | OCI |
